title: Deleted ban appeal
body: So.. I made a discussion about my account which was permanently banned 2 years and 3 months ago. I told the story and now my discussion is removed. Why?..

replies.body: If it was deleted, then you should have gotten a message on the forums about why (next to the notifications). If you didn't get a message then maybe there was a glitch and it disappeared

Good chance. There was a recent bug with the forums. I don't know if they ever corrected it or when.

And on the off chance my description was bad; there are two symbols.
One looks like a dialogue box
The other has an exclamation (!) inside it.
The [ ! ] is the one that would give the removal notice.
If it was deleted, it should have given you a notification on who and why deleted it, imperial panda pretty much says everything.
